attributes.action: re-instate the rolling 25 year exemption to historic vehicle tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present government stopped the rolling date where vehicles over 25 years old were granted exemption to the vehicle excise duty. This petition wishes to re-instate this rolling program.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
